title: will i get banned for my name?
body:
hey all,

just quickly, is my name considered "inappropriate"?

just need to know whether it's worth changing or not, as I don't want to risk anything. have spent so many hours and much money in this game already; and there's plenty to come.

thanks all!

replies.body: I doubt that name would cause any drama, and even if it did, the worst you would get would be a forced name change. You wouldn't get banned for a anme like that.
You should be banned just for the pure stupidity of having a name like that.
